topics.body:
So I'm done with the first episode. . .
..............................................................................................................................
UUUUUUUUUUUGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!

The animation is coolio and definitely above average, the action was definitely good, the cgi is good enough that you can't tell that it's cgi the majority of the time, but still *UGGGGGHHHHHH!*  Now I know how Transformers fans felt when they watched a Michael Bay Tranformer's film for the first time.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
I really hate when I work long days
I get stressed, and sometimes when I get stressed out, I get mad at people, but I don't like being mad at people because it upsets me, so I kind of rant in my head or quietly when people can't hear me, and I just ended feeling burnt out and I just don't want to do anything

topics.body:
If I had to summarize the problem with the Kantai anime is that story wise it's a cheap ripoff of Arpeggio of Blue Steel that lacks the charm of either Kancolle or Arpeggio.

I know it's a bit premature since it was the first episode, but christ even Kantai fans are riping the show a new asshole.
